name: Meeze
description:
Meeze is a maze puzzle in which the player must guide a mouse to the cheese.
Made in Unity in aprox. 20h in class. 

How to play:
Drag your finger on the screen to guide the mouse through the maze and reach the cheese. You must not touch the walls, let go of the screen or go back through where you came from – or you will be eaten by the evil cat.

Carolina Ribeiro -  Game Designer & UI Artist - https://carolinabcr.itch.io/
Inês Correia - 2D Artist - https://inescorreia.itch.io/
Jenifer Lagoaça - Programmer
